thread.title: BRIEF-Puerto Rico Oversight Board Says Proposed G.O.-COFINA Settlement Does Not Align With Island's Fiscal Turnaround Plan

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Puerto Rico Oversight Board Says Proposed G.O.-COFINA Settlement Does Not Align With Island's Fiscal Turnaround Plan
text:
May 14 (Reuters) - Financial Oversight and Management Board for Puerto Rico:
* PUERTO RICO OVERSIGHT BOARD SAYS PROPOSED G.O.-COFINA SETTLEMENT DOES NOT ALIGN WITH THE ISLAND’S FISCAL TURNAROUND PLAN - STATEMENT FROM BOARD
* PUERTO RICO OVERSIGHT BOARD SAYS PROPOSED TERMS WOULD CREATE “LARGE AND RECURRING STRUCTURAL DEFICITS” - STATEMENT
